CustomField.description: This field is used to store API name of the object's field that is populated with the Id of the user when assignment happens. It defaults to OwenrId (built-in) field of object. Users can specify what field to use as "Owner".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to store API name of the object's field that is populated with the Id of the user when assignment happens. It defaults to OwenrId (built-in) field of object. Users can specify what field to use as "Owner".
CustomField.label: Object Owner Field
